data.title: Access by train
data.text:
EuroAirport is not linked directly to the railway system, but there are connections by public transport to the railway stations in Basel with trains to Switzerland, France and Germany, and to the railway stations in Saint-Louis and Freiburg.

F - EuroAirport - Mulhouse, Colmar and Strasbourg

Take the Distribus shuttle No 11 to Saint-Louis Train Station and then transfer to the train.

All relevant information can be found on the TER fluo Website of the French national railroad company SNCF.

- From Germany:

Destination Basel German Train Station (Basel Badischer Bahnhof) with the German train network

(long distance trains usually continue to Basel Central Station with an easier connection to EuroAirport, see above).

Connection to EuroAirport by tram line no 2 (timetable: www.bvb.ch/de/fahrplan/haltestellen-fahrplan/?l=Linie 02) from Badischer Bahnhof to Bahnhof SBB, then change to airport bus no 50 (timetable: www.bvb.ch/de/fahrplan/haltestellen-fahrplan/?l=Linie 50).
